name: flamaraderie
description:
Flames are kind of rad, right? Flame is cool, flame is hot, flame is glorious. We love flame, you love flame, everybody love flame.
Come and sit by the fire. Praise the Lord in spirit and truth, kindle our faith, brighten our hope, and deepen our love.

Although resource is scarce, wood supply is limited, and the livestock is running out. But together we will always have willing flesh to burn. After all, meat is meat. And sometimes, meat are flammable..
